summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: the in WhoWeAreSection.tsx keeps the same alt text and className while swapping the src to /assets/dr-banner.jpg. However, additional unrelated files were modified beyond the requested single-image swap constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to swapping the WhoWeAreSection image.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to swap the image (asset/reference) for a specific without other changes; updating project state metadata was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt content describing many unrelated app changes (routing, SEO, content, layout, assets).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly disallow changing other images/styling/layout; while this file may be a summary artifact, it is a modified file not requested as part of the image swap.
